integrations.name: TheHive Project Integration
integrations.description: Native Cortex XSOAR integration that enables bidirectional case synchronization, task management, observable handling, and automated workflows between XSOAR and TheHive with support for case merging and mirroring

integrations.name: falcon2thehive
integrations.description: Real-time connector that streams CrowdStrike Falcon detection events into TheHive, turning Falcon alerts into actionable TheHive Alerts. Supports DetectionSummaryEvent, IdentityProtectionEvent, and MobileDetectionSummaryEvent with automatic observable extraction and TTP mapping.

integrations.description: Native Kibana connector that allows Elasticsearch to create alerts and create cases in TheHive

integrations.description: Pre-built workflow nodes that enable automated data transfer and task orchestration between n8n, Cortex analyzers/responders, and TheHive cases/alerts/observables

integrations.name: TheHive Extension
integrations.description: Rapid7 InsightConnect extension that enables automated workflows with TheHive for case management, alert handling, and incident response orchestration

integrations.name: TheHive 5 Integration
integrations.description: Native Shuffle app integration that enables workflow automation with TheHive 5 for automated case management, alert handling, and incident response orchestration

integrations.name: TheHive SOAR Connector
integrations.description: Official Splunk SOAR connector with 16 actions for case management, task operations, observable handling, and TTP tracking to automate incident response workflows between Splunk and TheHive

integrations.name: TheHive/Cortex Technical Add-on
integrations.description: Bidirectional integration add-on that pulls case and alert events from TheHive, retrieves Cortex job information, and enables creating alerts/cases and executing functions in TheHive directly from Splunk searches and dashboards
